mapper.select: select t.tradin_id,t.publisher_uid,t.type_id,t.content,t.point_balance,t.pi_balance,u.user_name,u.user_image from tradin_post t left join user_info u on u.uid=t.publisher_uid where t.status = 0 and t.type_id = #{typeId} order by t.create_time desc limit #{page},#{limit}

select t.tradin_id,t.publisher_uid as sellerId,t.type_id,t.content,t.point_balance,t.pi_balance,t.pi_address,u.user_name,u.user_image from tradin_post t left join user_info u on u.uid=t.publisher_uid where t.tradin_id=#{tradinId}

select t.tradin_id,t.publisher_uid,t.type_id,t.content,t.point_balance,t.pi_balance,t.pi_address,u.user_name,u.user_image,t.status from tradin_post t left join user_info u on u.uid=t.publisher_uid where t.publisher_uid=#{userId} order by t.update_time desc
